import { useState } from 'react' import './Header.scss' import SideBar from '../SideBar/SideBar' import logo from '../../assets/logo.svg' import { useHistory } from 'react-router' function Header(props) { const [isOpenSide, setIsOpenSide] = useState(false) const history = useHistory() window.addEventListener('scroll', (e) => { window.scrollTo(0,0); }) const showSideBar = () => { setIsOpenSide(!isOpenSide) } return (
history.push('/start')}/>
) } export default Header
